scripts.start: npm run showcase && cd ../extended-pdf-viewer && ng s -o
scripts.unix-package: npm run prebuild && ng b ngx-extended-pdf-viewer && rm -r dist && ng-packagr -p projects/ngx-extended-pdf-viewer/ng-package.json && cd projects/ngx-extended-pdf-viewer && npm run build && cd ../..
scripts.showcase: npm run unix-package && rm -r -f ../extended-pdf-viewer-showcase/node_modules/ngx-extended-pdf-viewer && cp -R dist/ngx-extended-pdf-viewer ../extended-pdf-viewer-showcase/node_modules/ngx-extended-pdf-viewer
scripts.issue: npm run unix-package && rm -r ../../ngx-beyondjava/node_modules/ngx-extended-pdf-viewer && cp -R dist/ngx-extended-pdf-viewer ../../ngx-beyondjava/node_modules/ngx-extended-pdf-viewer
scripts.win-package: npm run prebuild && ng b ngx-extended-pdf-viewer && rmdir dist /S && ng-packagr -p projects/ngx-extended-pdf-viewer/ng-package.json
scripts.release: npm run unix-package && cd dist/ngx-extended-pdf-viewer && npm publish && cd .. && cd .. && ./createTag.sh && node ./increase-version-number.js
scripts.quick: cd ../ngx-extended-pdf-viewer && ./quick.sh && npm run showcase && cd ../extended-pdf-viewer-showcase && npm run prebuild && ng s --host 0.0.0.0
scripts.full: cd ../ngx-extended-pdf-viewer && ./updateMozillasPdfViewer.sh && npm run showcase && cd ../extended-pdf-viewer-showcase && npm run prebuild && ng s --host 0.0.0.0
scripts.ts: cd ../ngx-extended-pdf-viewer && npm run showcase && cd ../extended-pdf-viewer-showcase && ng s --host 0.0.0.0
scripts.config: ng build ngx-extended-pdf-viewer && cd projects/ngx-extended-pdf-viewer && npm run build && cd ../.. && npm link ./dist/ngx-extended-pdf-viewer && cd ../test && git stash && npm link ngx-extended-pdf-viewer && ng generate ngx-extended-pdf-viewer:config --name schubidoo
scripts.add: ng build ngx-extended-pdf-viewer && cd projects/ngx-extended-pdf-viewer && npm run build && cd ../.. && npm link ./dist/ngx-extended-pdf-viewer && cd ../test && git stash && npm i && npm link ngx-extended-pdf-viewer && ng add ngx-extended-pdf-viewer
